segments.text: Hey , Joshua ! Is Anny coming with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just asking ? But why is your face burning like mad ? Aha , someone has a crush on Anny , doesn't he ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , Josh , don't be such a chicken . If you like her , you've got to tell her . Maybe she likes you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd totally die if she turned me down .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You've got to let her know . Come on ! You've got to take a chance !
segments.speaker: S2
